main event: The observer reported seeing scattered white blobs of light darting around in the sky, changing direction and speed. The lights would appear and disappear at times, and seemed to float or drift rather than move in a steady, straight line.
interesting points: The lights did not seem to be attached to any solid object that could be seen.
The lights reminded the observer of light scattered and reflected on water, like sunlight glimmering on the water's surface.
The observer reported that the lights were white and would dart around, changing direction and speed.
The lights would occasionally appear and disappear during the sighting.
The motion of the lights was described as floating or drifting, rather than a steady, straight-line flight.
